column3: â€œYou may be wondering why there are currently so few review's for this strain, that would be because most who smoke it are too stoned to get back to the app to make the review. Would recommend.â€

â€œWhere I live this strain isn't avalible often so when I saw it, I knew I had to try it. Oh boy, this strain was amazing. Super fun strain to do with friends as well, played through most of the AC games lol. 5/5â€
â€œImagine how you feel when you smoke Girl Scout Cookies PLUS how you feel when youâ€™re at your most mellow. Boom. Ghost Cookies.â€

â€œHOLY SHIT! Heady but sedating. Relaxed to the point of no return... Nice doughy smell as described. This was tested at 28% THC!â€

â€œWhile it is borne of two powerhouses, the high is very pleasant and brings about a very nice mood. Mind you, if you get into the higher depths of it, it can be a potent ride. With body tinglings and an expansive mind, it could a bit overwhelming for the novice or low-tolerant, but just know you limits. It is a creeper so, just wait a little extra before taking another hit if youâ€™re new to weed. But i can assure you, ...â€
